treatments_requested.name: Nurse Care Management
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: CPT code G0162, 1 unit at 15 minutes each

treatments_requested.name: Home Health or Hospice Nursing Services
treatments_requested.other_or_notes: CPT code G0299, 3 units at each 15 minutes

rationale: The patient has profound cognitive deficits and requires indefinite assistance with basic care and mobility. The requested services are custodial in nature and not medically indicated. Therefore, the requested skilled nursing services are not medically necessary for the treatment of the patient's condition.
reviewer_credentials: Board certified in physical medicine and rehabilitation, actively practicing, expert in the treatment of the enrollee’s medical condition.
